text:
Hi team.
I have developed a custom theme for a client, but their Google Ads stopped running a week after we went live.
The theme is quite simple and has no complex scripts on it (apart from the menu toggles, accordions, and such DOM manipulations)

The message on the google dashboard is a strange one, Google Ads is disapproving ads because it’s listing Malicious Software: <https://support.google.com/adspolicy/answer/6020954?hl=en#311>

Could it be that there is a script on HubSpot causing it? I have spent more time than I’d like to admit on this, but can’t seem to figure it out.

Any help would be appreciated :pray:
